column2: "Task 3: <yellow>Perform Chain Finish with a Chain of 10 or higher"

"・Activate Chain Trigger from
\u3000the Subpalette
・Hit with Normal Attacks to
\u3000raise the Chain Count
・Use a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>
\u3000to perform a Chain Finish"
